name: 呂志誠
objective: 先修課程：半導體元件物理﹙4005032﹚。本課程著重於IC製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
schedule:
週次            單 元 主 題

1.　　Introduction to semiconductor fabrication
2.　　Semiconductor basics
3.　　Wafer preparation & thermal processes
4.　　Plasma process
5.　　Photolithography
6.　　Ion implantation
7.　　Etching technologies
8.　　CVD and thin film deposition
9.　　Metallization and PVD
10.　　Chemical mechanical polishing (CMP)
11.　　CMOS process integration
12.      Exam
13.　　Industry seminar – To be determined
14.      Paper review and presentation I
15.      Paper review and presentation II
16.      Paper review and presentation III
17.      Paper review and presentation IV
18.      Final exam
scorePolicy:
Group teaching teamwork: 30%
Paper report and presentation : 20%
Final exam : 40%　　 
Presence : 10%
materials:
教科書 (Textbook)
Hong Xiao, Introduction to semiconductor manufacturing technology, 2001, Prentice Hall, (歐亞書局), ISBN-0130224049.

1.J.D. Plummer, M.D. Deal and P.B. Griffin, Silicon VLSI technology, 
  2000, Prentice Hall.
2.S.M. Sze, VLSI technology, 1988, McGraw Hill.
3.S.M. Sze, Semiconductor devices, physics and technology, 1985, 
  Wiley.
4.莊達人，VLSI製造技術，高立圖書。
